hero_section.industry_leading: With the best trading conditions in the industry

benefits.trade_salary_desc: By working with our trading team, you earn based on your performance. This salary can be a percentage of your trade profits — the better your performance, the higher your income.
benefits.fix_income_desc: This fund is designed to provide stable and secure income. You can receive a fixed monthly amount from investment profits or financial activities of the company without having to trade yourself.
benefits.shareholding_desc: By purchasing shares of PropEx, you become a shareholder and share in the company's profits and losses. This allows you to benefit from the company's growth and success and participate in key decisions.
benefits.coaching_desc: By leveraging the experience and knowledge of professional coaches, you can improve your trading skills and achieve greater success. This coaching includes market analysis, trading strategies, and risk management.
benefits.social_insurance_desc: With social insurance, you can benefit from financial and social support when needed. This includes health coverage, retirement plans, and other services that help you stay secure during challenging times.

coaching.title: Coaching
coaching.desc: By leveraging the experience and knowledge of professional coaches, you can improve your trading skills and achieve greater success. This coaching includes market analysis, trading strategies, and risk management.

benefits.basic_start_account_description: In this phase, you’ll get familiar with the basics of trading and set up your trading account. It includes introductory training on markets, trading tools, and how to use trading platforms.
benefits.psychology_description: This section introduces the psychological aspects of trading. You'll learn how to manage emotions, control stress, and make decisions under pressure — all essential to trading success.
benefits.capital_management_description: Here, you'll learn capital management principles and receive expert guidance on allocation, risk control, and profit optimization — helping you enhance your trading strategy.
benefits.analyse_tecknical_description: You’ll join a community of professional traders to share technical analyses, strategies, and experiences. This peer support helps accelerate your growth as a trader.
